user_query: I'm planning a surprise party for my sister's graduation and I need some ideas for decorations and entertainment. Fetch the top memes from Reddit and get me the trending memes as well. Also, check if the username 'graduationparty' is available on Dribbble and Shopify. Finally, provide me with the top comments by the username 'graduationlover' from Reddit.

TaskList.description: Fetch the top memes from Reddit.
Check if the username 'graduationparty' is available on Dribbble.
Check if the username 'graduationparty' is available on Shopify.
Fetch the top comments by the username 'graduationlover' from Reddit.
